name: Dekarta Capital
overview: Founded in December 2008 Dekarta Capital is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in early stage and growth equity investments in medium-sized companies. Presently, Dekarta Capital manages the assets of a private fund equal to $100 million. The firm seeks to invest in all sectors with a focus on financial services, retail, media, Internet and technology. It typically invests up to $1 million at the early stage and between $2 million and $15 million at later stages. The fund supports technology companies that have originated in Russia, Ukraine and Latvia, which have clearly demonstrated their potential to become industry leaders in the global arena.

funding_round.source_description: ExpoPromoter Raises US$1M in Series A Funding from Dekarta Capital
